name: Koneko
description:
Koneko the cat must defend his home from eviction, but he won't resort to killing the mischievous mice infesting his abode. Help Koneko outsmart the pesky rodents and keep his home safe and sound by using your wits to hide the mice away. Can you help Koneko save his beloved home?

Move with WASD to push those pesky rodents back into their dens!

You can play on Unity Play official page too!

https://play.unity.com/mg/other/webgl-r66
